original_text:
Give ear, O my people, to my teaching;
    incline your ears to the words of my mouth!
korean_text: 내 백성이여, 내 율법을 들으며 내 입의 말에 귀를 기울일지어다

sentences.original_text: Give ear, O my people, to my teaching
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 백성이여, 내 교훈에 귀를 기울이라

sentences.original_text: incline your ears to the words of my mouth!
sentences.korean_translation: 내 입의 말에 너희 귀를 기울이라
